name: Infinite Bull Rider
description:
The goal is to stay on top of the mad bull as long as it's possible by countering bull's movements. How to play:
  • When the bull leans Forward, you counter that by leaning backward (press S or Down Arrow key).
  • When the bull leans Backward, you counter that by leaning forward (press W or Up Arrow key).
  • When the bull leans Right, you counter that by leaning left (press A or Left Arrow key).
  • When the bull leans Left, you counter that by leaning right (press D or Right Arrow key).
  • You have 3 Hats for every level (Hats resets).
  • Press Any key to start.

Source code : github.com
